statements: SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionData;
SELECT person_id FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT face_encoding FROM FacialRecognitionData;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE person_id = 2;
SELECT person_id, face_encoding FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE person_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT person_id, face_encoding FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE person_id > 5 ORDER BY person_id DESC;
SELECT person_id, face_encoding FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE person_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY person_id;
SELECT person_id, face_encoding FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE person_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY person_id;
SELECT person_id, face_encoding FROM FacialRecognitionData WHERE person_id < 4 OR person_id > 7 ORDER BY person_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM face_matches ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT match_id, confidence_score FROM face_matches WHERE confidence_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_name, face_encoding FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, face_encoding, user_id FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM face_matches WHERE confidence_score > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, face_matches.confidence_score FROM facial_recognition_data JOIN face_matches ON facial_recognition_data.user_id = face_matches.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM face_matches GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM FaceImage;
SELECT image_name, timestamp FROM FaceImage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT face_id, image_name FROM FaceImage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY face_id;
SELECT feature_id, feature_type FROM FaceFeature WHERE feature_type = 'Recognition';
SELECT query_face_id, match_face_id, match_similarity FROM FaceMatch WHERE match_similarity > 0.8 ORDER BY match_similarity DESC;
SELECT * FROM FaceImage;
SELECT face_id, image_name FROM FaceImage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feature_id, feature_data, feature_type FROM FaceFeature WHERE feature_type='facial';
SELECT match_id, query_face_id, match_face_id, match_similarity FROM FaceMatch WHERE match_similarity > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM FaceImage JOIN FaceFeature ON FaceImage.face_id = FaceFeature.face_id ORDER BY FaceImage.timestamp DESC, FaceFeature.feature_id;
SELECT * FROM face_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT template_id, image_url FROM face_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM face_users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_time FROM face_logs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT template_id, match_score FROM face_matches WHERE match_score > 0.8 ORDER BY match_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM face_templates;
SELECT template_id, image_url FROM face_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM face_matches WHERE match_score > 0.8 ORDER BY match_score DESC;

SELECT f.user_id, u.username, COUNT(l.log_id) AS log_count FROM face_users u JOIN face_logs l ON u.user_id = l.user_id JOIN face_faces f ON u.user_id = f.user_id GROUP BY f.user_id, u.username ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(l.log_id) AS log_count FROM face_users u LEFT JOIN face_logs l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING log_count > 5 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data;
SELECT name, encoding FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT filename, location, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT label_id, image_id, label FROM face_labels WHERE confidence >= 0.8;
SELECT image1_id, image2_id, match_score FROM face_matches ORDER BY match_score DESC;
SELECT name, image FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT match_id, match_score FROM face_matches ORDER BY match_score DESC;
SELECT image_id, capture_date, location FROM image_metadata WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT label, confidence FROM face_labels WHERE image_id = 5 AND confidence > 0.8;
SELECT embedding_id, COUNT(*) AS total_embeddings FROM face_embeddings GROUP BY embedding_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
